skills.name: Active Listening
skills.description: Fully concentrating, understanding, and responding thoughtfully during conversations.

skills.name: Presentation Skills
skills.description: Effectively delivering information to an audience in a clear, engaging manner.

skills.name: Written Communication
skills.description: Conveying ideas clearly through written formats such as emails or reports.

skills.name: Teamwork
skills.description: Working effectively and respectfully with others to achieve a common goal.

skills.name: Cross-functional Collaboration
skills.description: Working efficiently with colleagues from different departments.

skills.name: Interpersonal Skills
skills.description: Building and maintaining positive relationships with colleagues.

skills.name: Emotional Intelligence
skills.description: Recognizing and managing one’s own emotions and understanding others’ emotions.

skills.name: Motivating Others
skills.description: Inspiring and encouraging team members to perform at their best.

skills.name: Delegation
skills.description: Assigning tasks effectively while ensuring accountability and growth.

skills.name: Flexibility
skills.description: Adjusting to new conditions or unexpected challenges with ease.

skills.name: Learning Agility
skills.description: Quickly learning from experience and applying it to new situations.

skills.name: Resilience
skills.description: Bouncing back from setbacks and maintaining a positive attitude.

skills.name: Critical Thinking
skills.description: Analyzing information objectively to make reasoned judgments.

skills.name: Decision Making
skills.description: Choosing the best course of action among multiple alternatives.

skills.name: Creativity
skills.description: Generating innovative solutions to business problems.

skills.name: Resourcefulness
skills.description: Finding quick and clever ways to overcome difficulties.

skills.name: Prioritization
skills.description: Identifying the most important tasks and focusing on them first.

skills.name: Punctuality
skills.description: Meeting deadlines and being on time for meetings or deliverables.
